trans-unit.source: Provides command related utility methods that register <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBinding"></xref> objects for class owners and commands, add and remove command event handlers, and provides services for querying the status of a command.
trans-unit.target: Fornece o comando relacionado métodos de utilitário que registrarem <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding"> </xref> e <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBinding"> </xref> objetos para proprietários de classe e comandos, adicionar e remover manipuladores de eventos de comando e fornece serviços para consultar o status de um comando.

trans-unit.source: The CommandManager is responsible for managing routed commands.
trans-unit.target: O CommandManager é responsável por gerenciar comandos roteados.

trans-unit.source: For more information about commanding, see [Commanding Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre comandos, consulte [visão geral do comando](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RegisterClassCommandBinding%2A> to register a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> to a class as opposed to an instance.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RegisterClassCommandBinding%2A>para registrar um <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>a uma classe em vez de uma instância.</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RegisterClassCommandBinding%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RegisterClassInputBinding%2A> to register an <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding> to a class as opposed to an instance.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RegisterClassInputBinding%2A>para registrar um <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding>a uma classe em vez de uma instância.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RegisterClassInputBinding%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.InvalidateRequerySuggested%2A> method forces the CommandManager to raise the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested> event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.InvalidateRequerySuggested%2A>método força o CommandManager para gerar o <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.InvalidateRequerySuggested%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested> event informs a command source to query the command it is associated with to determine whether or not the command can execute.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested>evento informa uma fonte de comando para consultar o comando está associado para determinar se o comando pode executar.</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested>

trans-unit.source: Attaches the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler"></xref> to the specified element.
trans-unit.target: Anexa especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler"> </xref> para o elemento especificado.

trans-unit.source: Attaches the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler"></xref> to the specified element.
trans-unit.target: Anexa especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler"> </xref> para o elemento especificado.

trans-unit.source: Attaches the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler"></xref> to the specified element.
trans-unit.target: Anexa especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler"> </xref> para o elemento especificado.

trans-unit.source: Attaches the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler"></xref> to the specified element.
trans-unit.target: Anexa especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler"> </xref> para o elemento especificado.

trans-unit.source: Forces the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandManager"></xref> to raise the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Força o <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandManager"> </xref> para gerar o <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> only pays attention to certain conditions in determining when the command target has changed, such as change in keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager>só pagará atenção para determinadas condições para determinar quando o destino do comando foi alterado, como alteração de em foco do teclado.</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager>

trans-unit.source: In situations where the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> does not sufficiently determine a change in conditions that cause a command to not be able to execute, InvalidateRequerySuggested can be called to force the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> to raise the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested> event.
trans-unit.target: Em situações em que o <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager>suficientemente não determina uma alteração nas condições que causam a não ser capaz de executar um comando, InvalidateRequerySuggested pode ser chamado para forçar o <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager>para gerar o <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager>

trans-unit.source: Registers a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding"></xref> with the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Registra um <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding"> </xref> com o tipo especificado.

trans-unit.source: This method enables a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> to be associated with a class instead than an instance of a class.
trans-unit.target: Esse método permite que um <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>a ser associado uma classe de uma instância de uma classe.</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>

trans-unit.source: The class with which to register `commandBinding`.
trans-unit.target: A classe com o qual registrar `commandBinding`.
A associação de comando para registrar.

trans-unit.source: Registers the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBinding"></xref> with the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Registra especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBinding"> </xref> com o tipo especificado.

trans-unit.source: This method enables an <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding> to be associated with a type instead of an instance of a class.
trans-unit.target: Esse método permite que um <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding>a ser associado um tipo em vez de uma instância de uma classe.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding>

trans-unit.source: Detaches the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler"></xref> from the specified element.
Detaches the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler"></xref> from the specified element.
Detaches the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler"></xref> from the specified element.
Detaches the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler"></xref> from the specified element.
Occurs when the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandManager"></xref> detects conditions that might change the ability of a command to execute.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandManager"> </xref> detecta condições que podem alterar a capacidade de um comando seja executado.

trans-unit.source: Since this event is static, it will only hold onto the handler as a weak reference.
trans-unit.target: Como esse evento é estático, ele só manterá o manipulador como uma referência fraca.

trans-unit.source: Objects that listen for this event should keep a strong reference to their event handler to avoid it being garbage collected.
trans-unit.target: Objetos que escutam para esse evento devem manter uma referência forte para o manipulador de eventos para evitar que ele está sendo coletado como lixo.

trans-unit.source: This can be accomplished by having a private field and assigning the handler as the value before or after attaching to this event.
trans-unit.target: Isso pode ser feito com um campo particular e atribuindo o manipulador como o valor, antes ou depois de anexar a este evento.
